This is the official documentation for the **Airport** extension for DuckDB.

The Airport extension seamlessly integrates Apache Arrow Flight with DuckDB, enabling high-performance remote data access and distributed query execution. The extension is available as a [DuckDB community extension](https://duckdb.org/community_extensions/).

## Getting Started

To understand the vision and use cases behind Airport, start by reading the [motivation for creating the extension](motivation.qmd).

For installation instructions and a quick demo, visit the [home page](index.qmd).
